Town Council
============

Woman Standing at the Town Council PodiumMeetings
-------------------------------------------------

* 7:30 pm
* 1st and 3rd Tuesdays of each month

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://pvtx.gov/AgendaCenter/Town-Council-5)

### Make Your Voice Heard

You don’t have to be a council member to speak at the council meetings. Fill out a [Public Meeting Appearance Card (PDF)](https://pvtx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/197)!
